attributes.action: Get the utility companies to scrap the daily standing charge
attributes.additional_details: It disadvantages those on low incomes and those with low usuage, all while they all openly broadcast that they make millions every year in profits
attributes.background: Stop utility companies charging daily charges, it disadvantages those on low income and those with low usuage.
